name: Moving On!
description:
You live in a forest. You may think you are completely alone but you're not. Everything is against you in this game. Collect  4 apples during the day to be able to reset the day. To reset the day just press e when you're at the door of your log cabin. The controls are wasd and the interact button is f. If you're looking to take a drink id suggest finding the well but when you do you can fill you're water bottle. Press e to fill and drink. If you dehydrate you will die. To win you must find the salesman and he explains what you need. To make what he wants you need to obtain them from what comes at night.

PS. Id try not to hug those trees. Some of them have sap all over them and you will not be able to escape. If you want to reset just press escape. Press escape again to quit.

Credits:
